actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of May 23, 1908, and the act of March 1, 1911, for the purpose of increasing the amount of money paid to States and counties under such acts.

summary.text: Increases from 25 percent to 75 percent the amount of moneys received during any fiscal year from each national forest which shall be paid by the Secretary of the Treasury to the State in which such national forest is located to be expended for the public schools and public roads of the county or counties in which such national forest is located.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of May 23, 1908, and the act of March 1, 1911, for the purpose of increasing the amount of money paid to States and counties under such acts.
